EmailTemplate.description: Table to determine which Nav DB to use based on AC configuration
EmailTemplate.name: BRH Table to determine which NavDB to use
EmailTemplate.subject: Table to determine which NavDB to use specific to AC configuration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
To make sure that you are getting the correct database for your aircraft, please use the attached DSB2015005001. This DSB is used to determine which NavDB is appropriate for specific aircraft configuration.
You can also find this on ADS.Honeywell.com. Go to the bottom of the page and click on NavDB. Then go to "Flight Info" then "Alerts and Notices". You will see DSB201505001-Tables to determine which NavDB is appropriate for specific aircraft configuration.
Kind Regards,
Account Management Representative 602-436-6738 option 3 dsa@honeywell.com Honeywell Inc
